1.title: Zoe Saldana

episode of.title: Zoe Saldana Presents My Hero (TV Series 2014– )

1.plot: As a child growing up in the Dominican Republic, Zoe Saldana and her family faced a devastating tragedy. Her hero taught her how to stand strong in the face of adversity. Watch as she celebrates this incredible person with a special surprise thousands of miles away from her California home.

2.title: Julianne Hough

episode of.title: Zoe Saldana Presents My Hero (TV Series 2014– )

2.plot: Julianne Hough takes us to her hometown to show her adoration for a very special person in her life - a person who helped Julianne follow her dreams and who inspires her every day. Julianne surprises her hero with an important gift that has been a long time coming.

3.title: Nick Cannon

episode of.title: Zoe Saldana Presents My Hero (TV Series 2014– )

3.plot: Nick Cannons secret mission to surprise his Hero with a special gift is full of revelations and love. Meet the woman who made Nick who he is today, the one he will reveal as his Hero.

4.title: Maria Menounos

episode of.title: Zoe Saldana Presents My Hero (TV Series 2014– )

4.plot: Watch as E!'s Maria Menounos plots and plans how to honor her hero, the person she calls "the biggest supporter in her life". It turns out to be a very luxurious and dramatic experience.

5.title: Tyler Posey

episode of.title: Zoe Saldana Presents My Hero (TV Series 2014– )

5.plot: Tyler Posey's hero has battled four rounds of cancer and never once did it break his hero's spirit. From a slice of pizza to a trip of a lifetime, Tyler makes sure the biggest wish on his hero's bucket list comes true.

6.title: Perez Hilton

episode of.title: Zoe Saldana Presents My Hero (TV Series 2014– )

6.plot: Perez Hilton shares his incredible hero's story and makes sure his hero's memory is never forgotten.

7.title: Gina Rodriguez

episode of.title: Zoe Saldana Presents My Hero (TV Series 2014– )

7.plot: When Gina Rodriguez, the breakout star of "Jane the Virgin," was diagnosed with an unforeseen illness robbing her of a college scholarship, her dreams of acting were shattered. Her hero made great sacrifices to make sure Gina never gave up on her big dream.

8.title: Raven-Symoné

episode of.title: Zoe Saldana Presents My Hero (TV Series 2014– )

8.plot: Actress Raven-Symone honors her Hollywood hero, a very famous woman who helped mold and shape her career since her time on the Cosby Show.

9.title: Caroline Manzo

episode of.title: Zoe Saldana Presents My Hero (TV Series 2014– )

9.plot: Bravo's Caroline Manzo pays tribute to a real New Jersey housewife, a person who taught her a valuable lesson many years ago, that changed her life!

10.title: Heather McDonald

episode of.title: Zoe Saldana Presents My Hero (TV Series 2014– )

10.plot: Comedian and NYT best-selling author, Heather McDonald ambushes the one person who has supported her career and her family through her rise into the comedy spotlight.

imdb.title: Zoe Saldana Presents My Hero
akas: Zoe Saldana Presents My Hero (United States)
